instruction: Design an app that tracks exercise activities and gives users suggestions on how to improve their performance.
output: The app would provide users with an interactive way to track and monitor their exercise activities, such as running, cycling, swimming, and other physical activities. It would track and display key metrics such as caloric expenditure, total distance and speed, and current heart rate. Based on the data collected, it would provide users with tailored suggestions on how to improve their performance based on their goals, such as increasing speed, endurance, or even weight loss.
